content: Wailua Falls is one of the most popular waterfalls along the Road to Hana, and for good reason. Its towering height and stunning beauty will leave you in awe, making it a must-visit spot on your itinerary. The waterfall is located in a lush, tropical setting, with a well-maintained trail leading to a viewpoint where you can see the falls up close. Take a dip in the refreshing pool, relax on the rocks, or simply take in the stunning scenery. Wailua Falls is the perfect spot to unwind and rejuvenate before continuing your journey on the Road to Hana. Don't forget to pack a towel and some extra clothes, so you can fully enjoy this refreshing stop.
